specialConditions: Stunt safety plan required for all high-risk sequences
Animal handler liability and safety protocols mandatory
Higher deductible applies for work within Centrifuge set
Coverage extension required for international jurisdictions
Coverage for custom-built rigs (Centrifuge, Motion Control) subject to engineering approval and load testing
Underwater housing requires pre-shoot pressure test certification
ATA Carnet required for all equipment scheduled for international transit
Full medical examinations required for all insured essential elements
Stunt work for Keir Dullea and Gary Lockwood requires sign-off from stunt coordinator on each sequence
Coverage excludes delays due to creative differences
Subject to full script, title, and music clearance reports from a pre-approved law firm
Coverage for 'fair use' claims is excluded unless specifically reviewed and endorsed
Bond company has right of takeover if production falls significantly behind schedule or over budget
Weekly detailed cost reporting is mandatory
Bond company approval required for any significant script or schedule changes

riskFactors.description: Pioneering use of motion control, front projection, and custom-built rotating sets (Centrifuge). Lack of established safety or reliability data.
Filming in remote international locations (Kenya, Tanzania) with political instability, wildlife, and limited infrastructure.
Complex zero-gravity wirework and underwater stunts for key cast members, increasing risk of injury and production delays.
Highly ambitious and abstract script with unprecedented visual requirements, posing a risk to schedule and budget adherence.

recommendations: Mandatory and extensive pre-production testing of all new technologies and custom rigs with engineering oversight.
Secure on-site engineering and specialized medical support for all high-risk filming days (Centrifuge, Stunts, Underwater).
Develop comprehensive emergency evacuation and medical response plans for international locations.
Implement a rigorous daily safety briefing protocol, especially on days involving stunts, animals, or complex machinery.
Strict adherence to cost reporting schedules and proactive communication with the completion bond provider.
